plot: A drama in a film noir aesthetic about an elder woman who mistakes a fast food restaurant for her house, changing the life of one of the diner`s employees.
title: Cierre noche
plot_es: A drama in a film noir aesthetic about an elder woman who mistakes a fast food restaurant for her house, changing the life of one of the diner`s employees.
plot_en: A drama in a film noir aesthetic about an elder woman who mistakes a fast food restaurant for her house, changing the life of one of the diner`s employees.
